snippet.title: Armed For Battle, Trailer 2
snippet.description: In the first trailer of Armed For Battle, we visited the immediate area surrounding our home castle.  Now, we venture forth to the Overworld, an uncharted land which needs to be explored.  We soon discover the dangers lying ahead.  Armed For Battle is a homebrew game currently in development for the Nintendo Entertainment System.  Check back for progress updates, or feel free to contact me.
